subject: Re: [junit] junit is not working after install
msgSnippet: better to use eclipse  and the junit jar to the bulid path . pankaj khare  wrote:                               follow this link
messageBody:
better to use eclipse and the junit jar to the bulid path .
pankaj khare <pankaj.0405@...> wrote: follow this link
http://www.laliluna.de/assets/tutorials/junit-testing-en.pdf
